divs: sighting detailshi, check this out, not sure if you have seen this yet? object taken by 3 video cameras all at the same time. one close up and the two other at some distance (not sure if real or fake) check out this ufo videos over a temple in israel. the first one is a close up from a tourist's video or camera *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms\sg). and the second video is of the same object some distance away but caught on two different cameras *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms\sg). it looked real to me and listent to the reaction of the people in the back ground make sounds of wonderment
trends: There has been one other sighting in Jerusalem
There were no other sightings in Jerusalem on or around January 28th 2011
Summary: Look at UFO Video Hovering over an Israel Temple, not sure if real
